name: Marlone the Alchemist
description:
Her name is Marlone. She is careless and quick to complain, not to mention an academic disaster. This has earned her a reputation as a scholastic failure.
However, there is talent hidden deep within. Perhaps enough to see her someday become a legendary alchemist.
If she ever feels like it, that is.

ability.name: Weak Point Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when attacking a weakness.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when attacking a weakness.

name: You're Hopeless Without Me
description:
"Hmm. Hey, Eisel, which of these medicines should I use?"
"What? You seriously don't know, Elfir? For this recipe you've got to use―"
She may complain, but she is always kind as she explains. And that's how she wound up so spoiled.

ability.name: All Target Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% on attacks that hit all enemies.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage on attacks that hit all enemies.

name: A Contest for Teacher!
description:
As though out of the blue, the two students suddenly decide to compete to see which of them can draw the best portrait of their beloved teacher, Lilie.
"I don't plan on losing, Hermina!"
"That's my line, Ingrid!"
"I'm the best artist here!"
How will this battle of raw talent play out in the world of art?!

ability.name: Crush Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts own skill damage by {0}% upon defeating an enemy with a skill. (MAX 4%)

effects.description: Boosts skill damage by {value}% when defeating an enemy with a skill.

name: Run, Judith!
description:
"Whoa whoa whoa!"
A girl flies through some ruins, straddling her broom.
The roars of monsters follow close behind.
"Where was that exit?!"
Run, Judith!
You've got to get home safely with those materials!

ability.name: Critical Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts critical damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Critical damage.

name: The Land of Carrots
description:
Karotte Village. A desolate place with very little aside from endless carrot fields. One girl seeks to save her village from decline.
"Mmm, just look at that gloss! Get a whiff of that fragrance! Karotte really does have the best carrots around!"
She will no doubt need to focus her energies if she's to save her poor hometown.

ability.name: Attacker Damage Up I
ability.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a Attacker, boosts skill damage.

name: The Meowst Sunny Spot
description:
Norn awakens in a comfortable patch of sunlight.
"Yaaaawn, that was a great nap, meow!"
"Meow? Oh, you were taking a nap here too, meow?"
"Don't go using people's legs as a pillow without permission, meow!"
"Meow well, I guess I can't blame you on a sunny day like this."

ability.name: Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Skill damage.

name: Innocent Sound of Water
description:
"Ahaha! Hurry up!"
A small figure runs down steps still damp with rain. Her innocent footfalls make droplets of water splash and dance.
"Iris! Slow down, it's dangerous!"
Viese follows behind. Despite her concern, a smile adorns her face. A rainbow hangs overhead, as though watching over them.

ability.name: Breaker Stun Up I
ability.description: While equipped to a Breaker, boosts stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a Breaker, boosts stun damage.

name: Classmates
description:
"*Cough* *Cough* Vayne, Nikki... Sorry you had to stop for me."
"Come on, Jess, you need your rest."
"That's right! We'll whip you up some great medicine that'll have you right as rain!"
This much is hardly a bother when it's for the sake of a dear friend.

ability.name: Magic Stun Up I
ability.description: Boosts magic stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts magic stun damage.

name: Puni for You!
description:
"Ah, Puni are so soft."
For Lily, nuzzling Puni is the best way to heal her heart and soul.
"Here, Lily, you can have these too!"
"Ahhh! Quit it, Et! Oh, actually..."
Even Et's pranks add some joyful spice to things.

ability.name: All Target Stun Up I
ability.description: Boosts stun damage by {0}% on attacks that hit all enemies.

effects.description: Boosts stun damage on attacks that hit all enemies.

name: Teacher's Cure for Boredom
description:
"What are these ears for, Teacher?"
"Heehee, they look great on you, Rorona."
"They're embarrassing! I can't greet guests with these on!"
She complains, but Rorona admirably gets back to work. Even in this world, she can't seem to go against Astrid.
"Heh... Truly a beautiful sight."

ability.name: Boss Stun Up I
ability.description: Boosts stun damage by {0}% when attacking a boss.

effects.description: When attacking boss, boosts stun damage.

name: A Real Family
description: Eva works at the orphanage, where she serves as a reliable older sister to some and a nurturing mother figure to others. Lulua is the only person with whom Eva feels comfortable revealing her more vulnerable side. Regardless of what lies ahead, both of them firmly believe that their bond is unbreakable, no matter what challenges they may face in the future.

ability.name: Defender Damage Up I
ability.description: While equipped to a Defender, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a Defender, boosts damage.

name: The Scion of Arland
description:
A teacher passes knowledge on to a student. Such knowledge is power, enough to bring change to the kingdom.
Though perhaps not quite enough to change its fate.
However, the people of this kingdom will continue to live their lives with alchemy all around them.

ability.name: Received Weakness Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts damage received by the target by {0}% for 2 attacks when attacking a weakness.

effects.description: Boosts damage to target when attacking a weakness.

name: An Inviting Stream
description:
Ayesha, Wilbell, and Regina take a little break from their travels.
They rest their legs, as stiff as staves, in the cooling river and let it wash away the fatigue.
A little splashing around is fine, as long as they remember to hydrate as well.

ability.name: Boss Damage Up I
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when attacking a boss.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when attacking a boss.

name: Time for Sweets
description:
On a break from her busy work schedule, the sweetness of the apple pie seems to help melt the tension in her mind and body away.
She polishes off her plate. But it's somehow not enough. She reaches for a second.
"It's a reward for working so hard," she tells herself. And yet...

ability.name: Burst Up I
ability.description: Boosts burst skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts burst skill damage.

name: The Two Shallies
description:
Shallistera and Shallotte. Their upbringings, personalities, and lives could not be any more different.
Though they've had their share of disagreements, they've overcome many trials and have become an unstoppable team.
"With you by my side, I can handle anything."

ability.name: Final Foe Stun Up I
ability.description: Boosts stun damage by {0}% when there is only 1 enemy.

effects.description: Boosts stun damage when there is only 1 enemy.

name: Deal of the Day
description:
"Here's today's deal. This was crafted by a master craftsman. Just take a look at this!"
"Wow! Corneria, you're really good at balancing that!"
"The first rule of sales is to draw the customer's eye."
"I see! Thanks for the advice!"

ability.name: Heal Up I
ability.description: Boosts HP recovery given by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts recovery.

name: The Power of Three
description:
Three figures gather in the archives to search for a certain document.
They have passed their difficult exams and their proficiency has earned them official recognition as alchemists.
Though each has their own temperament, there is no problem the three of them cannot solve when they come together...probably.

ability.name: Item Charge Rhythm I
ability.description: Restores {0}% of item gauge at the start of turn.

effects.description: At the start of turn, recover item gauge.

name: Delicious Tea Time
description:
Suelle is transfixed as she enjoys a delicious cake during tea time.
Something about seeing this normally mischievous girl acting so cute and docile brings a smile to the faces of Sophie and Mathias.

ability.name: Supporter Healing Strike I
ability.description: While equipped to a Supporter, when attacking, recover {0}% of HP.

effects.description: While equipped to a Supporter, when attacking, recovers HP.

name: A Melody on the Wind
description:
The gentle melody of a flute echoes across the expansive grasslands. Klaudia has snuck away from her father and her friends to have some alone time. She thinks, "One day I'll share my hobby with everyone..."
But she feels relieved knowing that today is not that day.

ability.name: Hearty Heal Up I
ability.description: Boosts HP recovery given by {0}% when own HP 70% or higher.

effects.description: Boosts HP recovery given when own HP is over 70%.

name: The Taste of Civilization
description:
Ryza follows Patricia's directions to a popular crepe stand in the capital. An astonished gasp escapes her as she takes her first bite of the capital's cuisine.
This is only the first of many new discoveries that await her in her new home.

ability.name: Supporter Damage Up on Hit I
ability.description: While equipped to a Supporter, when attacking, boosts target's damage received by {0}% for 2 attacks.

effects.description: While equipped to a Supporter, when attacking, boosts damage received by the target.

name: My Atelier
description:
Many people come to visit this atelier.
Some are old friends, some are travelers, scholars, or even knights.
All this despite the fact that she's merely borrowed this atelier to study for her exams.
However, at this moment, this place is more important to her than anything.

ability.name: Final Foe Damage Up II
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when there is only 1 enemy.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when there is only 1 enemy.

name: Searching for the Heavenly City
description:
The heavenly city of Avenberry. Some say this city built on a mountain's peak is home to a great treasure.
A young alchemist named Klein travels in search of the city accompanied by Lita, a girl he met during his travels.
But what fate awaits them at their destination?

ability.name: Physical Damage Up II
ability.description: Boosts physical skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts physical skill damage.

name: School Friends
description:
A thought for the friends I made at school.
Though we may sometimes bicker or find ourselves at odds, you will always be my dear and reliable comrades.
Together, we can face any trials that await us.
That's how I've always felt, anyway.

ability.name: Dire Damage Up II
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when own HP is 50% or lower.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when own HP is 50% or lower.

name: The Place I Want to Protect
description:
Atelier Rorona lies tucked away in a corner of the Artisan's Way in Arland. Despite her inexperience, Rorona has tried her best to keep the atelier going ever since her teacher entrusted it to her.
Everything she does is to protect the place most precious to her heart.

ability.name: Weak Point Damage Up II
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when attacking a weakness.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when attacking a weakness.

name: Following in Your Footsteps
description:
Her mother set out on a journey and has yet to return.
Where could she be? The question gradually occupies more of Totori's attention until, one day, she sets off from her home to pursue in her mother's footsteps.
Even when the trail goes cold, she presses on, believing her mother is waiting for her somewhere beyond the sea...

ability.name: Magic Damage Up II
ability.description: Boosts magic skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts magic skill damage.

name: The Power to Change the World
description:
The country is so small, one might be able to look over its entirety simply by climbing a tree.
Meruru has made up her mind. She will use the power of alchemy she learned from her teacher to expand her country.
As a princess, as an alchemist, she stands, ready to change her world.

ability.name: Received Air Damage Up II
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, attacks boost damage received by the target by {0}% for 2 attacks.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, boosts damage to target.

name: What I'm Striving For
description:
An alchemist searches for materials in a field of flowers on the edge of town.
She hears her beloved mother's gentle voice calling her from far away. But, for now, she pays it no mind.
In order to step out of that person's shadow, she has to work harder.

ability.name: Slash Affinity Damage Up II
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Slash affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Slash affinity, boosts skill damage.

name: Walking the Lands of Dusk
description:
A world quietly awaiting its end. This once-great civilization has fallen into decay, leaving only ruins engulfed in vegetation.
Such is the nature of the world Ayesha traverses alone.
She wanders through the lands of Dusk in search of her beloved sister.

ability.name: Bolt Affinity Damage Up II
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Bolt affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Bolt affinity, boosts skill damage.

name: Looking up At the Dusk Skies
description:
Balloons fly back and forth, carrying materials through the frontier town.
Two alchemists, Escha and Logy, have agreed to help the town's development efforts.
Hand-in-hand they chase their dreams into the Dusk skies.

ability.name: Air/Slash (Weak) Resist Down II
ability.description: Reduces the target's Air resistance by {0}% and Slash resistance by {1}% for 2 attacks when attacking a target's weakness.

effects.description: Grants Air resistance to the target when attacking a weakness.
Grants Slash resistance to the target when attacking a weakness.

name: Embraced by the Dusk Sea
description:
The Dusk Sea—a sandy expanse that stretches out to the horizon. Its sands threaten to slowly swallow the last remaining oasis.
Two girls, Shallistera and Shallotte, live their lives in such a place, each with her own hopes and desires.
When these two "Shallies" meet, the Dusk Sea's wheel of fate begins to turn.

ability.name: Physical Stun Up II
ability.description: Boosts physical stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts physical stun damage.

name: The Tales We Weave
description:
Sophie suddenly peeks out from behind a tree. A smile spreads across her face as her friend looks up at her.
This tale began when Sophie met a book that had lost its memories.
What started as a fateful encounter became the new normal, as fate wove their stories together.

ability.name: Strike (Weak) Resist Down II
ability.description: Reduces target's Strike resistance by {0}% for 2 attacks when attacking a target's Strike weakness.

effects.description: On attacking a weakness or dealing a Strike attack, grants Strike resistance to target.

name: The Infinite Horizon
description:
Since she was a young child, she has dreamed of the wide outside world. Led by a mysterious power, Firis finally sets foot out there. The expansive skies, the dancing winds, and the endless lands all seem to envelop her.
Everything she lays her eyes on is brand new and makes her heart pound with excitement as she takes the first steps of her journey.

ability.name: Strike Affinity Heal Up II
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Strike affinity, boosts HP recovery given by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Strike affinity, boosts HP recovery.

name: The Twins' Dream
description:
To become the number one atelier in the country.
That is the dream of these twin alchemists.
Lydie, the quiet and laid-back older sister.
Suelle, the upbeat and tomboyish little sister.
Though the two of them don't always see eye to eye, the goal they've set their eyes on is the same.

ability.name: Damage Up on Magic Hit II
ability.description: When hit with a magic attack, boosts own skill damage by {0}% for 2 turns.

effects.description: When hit by a magic attack, boosts skill damage.

name: A Summer Adventure
description:
Ryza and her friends set off on a secret adventure to escape their boring lives.
The fluffy summer clouds hang over them, as though watching over their travels.
Their journey may very well reveal to them what is most important of all.

ability.name: Stab Affinity Stun Up II
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Stab affinity, boosts stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Stab affinity, boosts stun damage.

name: An Adventurous Premonition
description:
It's been three years since her summer of adventure. Ryza has traveled from her little island and settled in the royal capital.
New sights and encounters await her, as well as reunions with old friends. A premonition of her next adventure fills her heart with excitement.

ability.name: Supporter Stun Up (All) II
ability.description: While equipped to a Supporter, boosts the stun damage of all allies by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a Supporter, boosts all allies' stun damage.

name: The Changing Scenery
description:
It's been a few years since she began learning alchemy at this atelier.
Somewhere along the way, she's become used to the scenery here.
"It's so pretty. It's like I'm floating in a dream."
"Hey, Resna! Let's go check out what's over there!"
"Okay, let's go!"
The everyday sights around her haven't yet lost their vivid color.

ability.name: Fire Affinity Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts skill damage.

name: It's Time to Study!
description:
"So, in other words, one of the most important theories in alchemy is—"
Hmm, she was supposed to be helping me study for the knight exams, though...
"Next, listen to how the stars are tied to alchemy! It's really important, so make sure to memorize this, Izana!"
Ah well, as long as Resna is having fun, I guess it's okay!

ability.name: Supporter Damage Up (All) III
ability.description: While equipped to a Supporter, boosts skill damage of all allies by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts all allies' skill damage for Supporters.

name: The Future in His Eyes
description:
"Who would have thought there'd be so much mana sleeping beneath the earth?"
Roman stands alone in a cave glistening with crystals.
"Could this mean...? Heh, this seems worth looking into."
A blessing from the stars glistens in a small bottle in his hands. He stares past the bottle, to some as-yet-undetermined future.

ability.name: Fire Affinity Stun Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts stun damage.

name: Those Who Weave History
description:
Alchemy is an art that utilizes the blessing of the stars as fuel to create something new. Alchemists wield this art to make their dreams a reality and change the course of history.
One such alchemist, Saskia, stands poised to use that power to weave history anew.

ability.name: Fire Affinity Heal Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts HP recovery received by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts HP recovery received.

name: Snuggling With Flowers
description:
"These flowers are so pretty. I'd love to pick a whole bouquet!"
"Yeah. And the most beautiful flower of all is...!"
"Wh-What are you doing, Valeria?"
"I'm taking the two loveliest lovely flowers home!"
"W-We're not flowers."

ability.name: Ice Affinity Heal Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts HP recovery given by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts HP recovery given.

name: My Partner
description:
Inside the dimly lit ruins, faint starlight illuminates her long hair. This warrior with cold, empty eyes is the one who saved me from my predicament.
That was the fateful meeting between my partner and me.

ability.name: Slash Affinity Stun Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Slash affinity, boosts stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Slash affinity, boosts stun damage.

name: Striking it Rich!
description:
"Oh, I found some treasure! Whoa, what?!"
The flapping of monstrous wings draws closer as Heidi runs over.
"Leave this to me! Yaaah!"
"Thanks, Mu! Now, while you've got them distracted, let's open this!"
Her experienced hands make quick work of the locked treasure chest. But just what awaits them inside...?

ability.name: Stab Affinity Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Stab affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Stab affinity, boosts skill damage.

name: An Angel's Kindness
description:
"Lanze, wake up."
"Uh? Guess I fell asleep. Urp."
His head pounds and a wave of nausea washes over him. He's had too much to drink again.
"Here's some water. You'll catch a cold if you sleep here. You need to take better care of yourself."
She's gentle as an angel, as always.

ability.name: Burns Damage Up III
ability.description: When the target is inflicted with Burns, boosts skill damage received by the target by {0}% for 2 attacks.

effects.description: Boosts received damage for burned targets of skills.

name: A Time Just for Two
description:
The two of them are alone in the atelier.
The only sounds they can hear are the gentle clinking of tools and their excited chatting voices.
An ordinary moment just like any other.
But to these two childhood friends, this moment is special.

ability.name: Hearty Damage Up III
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when own HP is 70% or higher.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when own HP is 70% or higher.

name: The Alchemists of Dusk
description:
They face a world crumbling towards its end.
Some search for beloved family members.
Others chase their dreams into the sky.
Others still seek to have their wishes granted.
As their desires cross paths, they come ever closer to the truth of this world of Dusk.

ability.name: Air Affinity Heal Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, boosts HP recovery given by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, boosts HP recovery given.

name: Shoot for the Sky
description:
Escha and Logy head home after a hard day of work.
Accomplishment is its own reward.
Their faces beam with the satisfaction of a job well done.
Their spirits are high as a balloon quietly lifts them into the Dusk sky.

ability.name: Slash Affinity Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Slash affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Slash affinity, boosts skill damage.

name: When Dolls Dream
description:
Plachta has stood by Sophie's side and watched her grow, sometimes as a teacher, sometimes as a friend.
But what does she see when she closes her eyes? A student who can stand on her own? Precious memories the friends have shared?
Or, perhaps...

ability.name: Strike Evade Up III
ability.description: Evades when receiving a Strike attack. (Rate: {0}%)

effects.description: Evades when receiving a Strike attack. (Rate)

name: Further Still!
description:
Firis straddles her latest creation, a broomstick that carries her through open skies.
She says her goodbyes to the townscape below and heads toward her next destination.
What new encounters await her just beyond the horizon?

ability.name: Air Affinity Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, boosts skill damage.

name: What Lies Beyond
description:
Ryza is bored by the unchanging mundanities of her daily life.
But that is all about to change. Today, she and her friends take their first steps toward freedom.
They leave the ordinary behind and turn their gaze beyond the confines of their island home!

ability.name: Damage Up on Physical Hit III
ability.description: When hit by a physical attack, boosts own skill damage by {0}% for 2 turns.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when receiving a physical attack.

name: Lazy Afternoon
description:
Ryza smiles as she gazes at Fi's sleeping face during an afternoon nap.
The longer she watches that cute face, the more sleepy it seems to make her.
Their gentle snores reverberate through the air as the sun sets.

ability.name: Weak Point Damage Up III
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% when attacking a weakness.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when attacking a weakness.

name: A Continuation of That Summer
description:
The group of friends has separated, each pursuing their own path, though they will cherish the memories they shared forever.
However, they are destined to meet again. When their paths finally cross once more, they will continue the story that began that summer, so long ago.

ability.name: Weak Point Stun Up III
ability.description: Boosts stun damage by {0}% when attacking a weakness.

effects.description: Boosts stun damage when attacking a weakness.

name: In a Phantom World
description:
During her travels, Sophie found herself in a dreamlike world full of mysterious encounters and strange adventures.
With the memories of the companions she encountered in her heart, the alchemist Sophie sets out on a new journey.

ability.name: Damage Up III
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: Skill damage.

name: Under the Starry Sky
description:
"Hey, where did you all come from?"
Valeria asks, gazing up at the stars in the sky. Her voice is full of hope, sorrow, and resignation as her words fade into the void.
"I guess even you don't know, huh?"
She murmurs, as though speaking to herself.

ability.name: Supporter Heal Rhythm III
ability.description: While equipped to a Supporter, restore {0}% of own HP at the start of the turn.

effects.description: While equipped to a Supporter, recovers HP at the start of the turn.

name: By the Cool Riverside
description:
Spring water flows down from the mountains and into the ponds in Resna's hometown of Friegen. People of all ages gather together to take advantage of these bountiful brooks and cool off.
Listen closely, and you might hear the sound of the townsfolk biting into crisp, red fruits as they relax under a clear blue sky that seems to stretch on forever.

ability.name: Received Healing Up III
ability.description: Boosts HP recovery received by {0}%.

effects.description: Boosts HP recovery received.

name: Profuse Blows
description: With her staff raised, Sophie declares, "Okay! I'm really going for it!" The alchemical knowledge that she has acquired from books converges into one massive strike. "Once I put my mind to it, I can do anything!" The skills she has honed and the wisdom she has gained blossom on the battlefield.

ability.name: Bolt Affinity Damage Up On Hit III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Bolt affinity, when hit by an attack, boosts all allies' skill damage by {0}% for 1 turn.

effects.description: When attacked, boosts all allies' skill damage when equipped with Bolt affinity.

name: Intersecting Moments
description: The air is thick with the looming presence of monsters, but two master explorers slice straight through it. After delivering a fatal blow, Valeria lands lightly on the ground beside Ryza. Breathing as one, they already know their next moves without exchanging so much as a word.

ability.name: Slash/Stab Attack Damage Up III
ability.description: After attacking with a Slash or Stab attack, boosts own skill damage by {0}% for 2 turns.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage when attacking with Slash.
Boosts skill damage when attacking with Stab.

name: Hard at Work!
description: "Um, I need this book, and this one..." Marie is hard at work synthesizing in the atelier again today. Though it seems she's made a bit of a mess. "Whoa! ...Phew, that was a close one. Maybe I should tidy up after all..."

ability.name: All Target Stun Up III
ability.description: Boosts stun damage by {0}% for attacks that hit all enemies.

effects.description: Boosts stun damage on attacks that hit all enemies.

name: Welcome to the Party!
description: Meruru and Keina are on hand to greet the guests. "Thanks for coming! We hope you have a ton of fun today!" "Go ahead and help yourself to the refreshments." Their warm hospitality brings smiles to everyone's faces.

ability.name: Ice Affinity Damage Up (All) III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}% for all allies.

effects.description: Boosts skill damage for all Ice attribute allies.

name: Watching Fireworks
description: Resna and Esty are sailing toward a big party as fireworks bloom overhead. "Wow, they're so beautiful!" exclaims Resna. "Hehe! This sure is setting expectations high for today. We're definitely going to have a great time!" They might be focusing on different things, but their excitement is the same.

ability.name: Stun Up Tempo III
ability.description: At the start of the wave, boosts own stun damage by {0}% for 2 turns.

effects.description: Boosts own stun damage for 2 turns.

name: Sisters for a Day
description:
"Ayesha! Can you be my big sister for today?"
"Haha, of course. What would you like me to do?"
There are so many things Izana would like to try if she had an older sister. She took the opportunity to indulge to her heart's content.

ability.name: Attacker Area Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts all-target attack skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts skill damage of attacks that target all enemies.

name: Our Masterpiece
description:
"All done! Lydie, look!"
Happiness gained at long last, after all sorts of hardships, mistakes, and sorrows.
"Wow! That's a beautiful painting, Sue."
The twins will continue to paint a bright future together.

ability.name: Attacker & Supporter DMG Up III
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}% for all Attacker and Supporter allies.

effects.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts all allies' skill damage.
While equipped to a Supporter, boosts all allies' skill damage.

name: Adventure to New Horizons
description: Even if she awakens in an unknown world—even if there are two moons floating in the sky—Ryza's curiosity always outweighs her anxiety. Each day is filled with excitement for Ryza as she finds new materials she has never seen before and meets new faces in her adventures. Even if the world seems entirely different, the air, filled with the promise of adventure, is just like that summer.

ability.name: P. ATK Resist Down Slash III
ability.description: When using a physical attack, reduces target's Slash resistance by {0}% for 2 attacks.

effects.description: When using a physical attack, reduces target's Slash resistance for 2 attacks.

name: Endless Discoveries
description:
"Klaudia, look at that!"
"Wow, Ryza! That's really interesting."
Lila and Empel look on with confused expressions as the two best friends talk.
Empel then asks them, "What exactly are you two looking at?"
"That's our secret!"

ability.name: Attacker Magic Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts magic attack skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts magic attack skill damage.

name: Starbirth Festival Night
description:
"Let's go give presents to those people next!"
Spreading joy by handing out presents to everyone in town on the sacred night is what Resna considers to define the ideal Starbirth Envoy. With that dream driving her actions, she's committed to doing what she can, one step at a time.

ability.name: Ice Affinity Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts damage.

name: Destined by the Stars
description: Bathed in the moonlight are an alchemist who harbors endless dreams and a warrior in search of her lost memories. Is the path they tread one guided by the stars? Or perhaps...

ability.name: Attacker Damage Up (All) III
ability.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts skill damage for all allies by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to an Attacker, boosts all allies' skill damage.

name: Ebony Shadows of a Moonlit Night
description: Bathed in the moonlight are alchemists entranced by a hunger, and a watcher given the name of Crow. Are they the dark foes lurking in the world's shadows? Or perhaps...

ability.name: Breaker Stun Up (All) III
ability.description: While equipped to a Breaker, boosts stun damage for all allies by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a Breaker, boosts all allies' stun damage.

name: Adventurer's Feathered Respite
description:
A brightly colored bird alights on Ryza's shoulder as she stops for a moment's respite.
"Hm? Are you taking a break too?"
There are adventurers who walk the earth, and there are adventurers who soar through the skies, but sometimes, in the midst of nature, their adventures can come together for just a moment.
Just as Ryza feels ready to set off again, the bird also gently takes off into the air.

ability.name: Supporter P. ATK Up (All) III
ability.description: While equipped to a Supporter, boosts all allies' P. ATK by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a Supporter, boosts all allies' P. ATK.

name: Dance into the New Year
description:
Valeria dances gracefully to the melody of the flutes and the gong played by Judie.
"Is this the right way to dance?"
"Not sure... but as long as it's fun!"
This delightful start to the year promises a lively and joyful year ahead.

ability.name: Ice Affinity Critical Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts critical damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Ice affinity, boosts critical damage.

name: New Year Sale!
description:
"Step right up! Everything's on sale!"
The beginning of the year is a great time to do business. Wearing white and scarlet hakama, Resna and Shallistera energetically promote their wares, hoping their heartfelt creations will bring good health and happiness to many.

ability.name: Critical Attack Damage Up III
ability.description: After making a critical attack, boosts own skill damage by {0}% for 2 turns.

effects.description: After making a critical attack, boosts own skill damage for 2 turns.

name: Don't Underestimate Me!
description:
"Oh well. If they won't talk, I guess we have no choice..."
Just as Roman reaches for his sword, Marion draws her weapon right behind him. In the face of danger, they show resolve you would never expect from their usual demeanor.

ability.name: Attacker's Double Heal III
ability.description: While equipped to an Attacker, after attacking, restores HP by {0}% 2 times.

effects.description: While equipped to an Attacker, after attacking, restores HP.
While equipped to an Attacker, after attacking, restores HP.

name: Feathers Fly on a Festive Day
description:
Sophie and Monika enjoy a game of badminton, bringing out their inner child. Whoever drops the ball has to mark their face with ink.
"Careful, Monika, or I'll smudge the ink!"
"Back at you, Sophie!"
Their game, filled with cheerful banter and laughter, seems to go on forever.

ability.name: Item Charge Rhythm II
ability.description: Restores {0}% of item gauge at the start of the turn.

effects.description: Restores item gauge at the start of the turn.

name: Riding with a Best Friend
description:
"We're gonna be late!"
Sharlotte zooms off on her broom, best friend in tow, managing to hold on to some freshly made toast.
"Careful, Lotte. More haste, less speed."
"I know they say that, Stera, but..."
Even in rushed moments like this, their time together is always cherished.

ability.name: Fire Affinity Heal Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts HP recovery given by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Fire affinity, boosts recovery.

name: Silver Snow Delight
description:
"It's not often that we get to visit a snow-covered field. Let's make the most of it and have some fun!"
"As you wish, Your Highness..."
Following Roman's suggestion, Juna tries her hand at making a snowman for the first time. She becomes quite attached to the snowman she poured her heart into, which makes it all the more difficult to think that they will soon have to part.

ability.name: Follow-up Single DMG Up III
ability.description: When attack target is stunned, boosts single-target attack skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: When attack target is stunned, boosts single-target attack skill damage.

name: Chocolate Time
description:
"It's really thriving in here, Escha."
"Logy! You made it!"
Escha's face lights up with a warm smile upon seeing a familiar face.
"Just give me a sec to bring your order, okay?"
Escha was busy, bustling about, but that brief moment with Logy was oh-so rich and sweet.

ability.name: Stab Stun Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Stab affinity, boosts stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Stab affinity, boosts stun damage.

name: Sprinkling Magic from the Sky
description:
"Should be around here. Your turn, Shallotte!"
"Got it, Master Wilbell!"
On Wilbell's cue, Shallotte scatters chocolates and flyers across the capital's skies. Dressed in bewitching outfits, the two help promote the Linde Festival with a touch of gentle magic.

ability.name: P. ATK Resist Down Physical III
ability.description: When using a physical attack, reduces target's Slash, Strike, and Stab resistance by {0}% for 2 attacks.

effects.description: When using a physical attack, reduces target's Slash, Strike, and Stab resistance for 2 attacks.

name: Together in the Snow
description:
"Ahh, the snow is so beautiful, isn't it, Totori?"
Rorona and Totori walk side by side as snowflakes drift over the capital, both dressed in warm and stylish clothes.
"Careful, Teacher! If you keep looking around, you'll fall again!"
"I know, I know!"
 They may be an odd student-teacher pair, but their steps are perfectly in sync.

ability.name: Air DMG Up When Damaged III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, when hit by an attack, boosts all allies' skill damage by {0}% for 1 turn.

effects.description: While equipped to a character with Air affinity, when hit by an attack, boosts all allies' skill damage.

name: Stand Against the Apexi!
description: Out of nowhere, the Apexi Weltex emerges off the shores of Kur. Impervious to cannon fire, it wields a devastating power that no knights can stand against. Even so, Valeria, Lydie, and Suelle are all willing to put their lives on the line to face against the beast. Anything to protect their families and friends.

ability.name: Strike Affinity Critical Damage Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Strike affinity, boosts critical damage by {0}%.

effects.description: 得意属性が打属性の時、クリティカルダメージアップ

name: Overcoming Despair
description:
Heidi, Firis, and Flocke show they are ready to confront the Apexi, all dressed in armor that matches Valeria's. They know the threat they are facing all too well, but running has never even crossed their minds.
"Time for a counterattack! Flocke, Firis, let's go!"

ability.name: Strike Affinity Stun Up III
ability.description: While equipped to a character with Strike affinity, boosts stun damage by {0}%.

effects.description: 得意属性が打属性の時、ブレイクダメージアップ

name: Nothing to Fear with Friends
description:
Rumor has it that valuable treasures are hidden in these ruins. Eager to stock up, Flocke heads into the ruins with Heidi in tow.
"Um... are you sure it's safe to go this deep?"
"Don't worry! My research says it's safe here, I think. Maybe. Probably."

ability.name: Item Charge Tempo II
ability.description: Restores item gauge by {0}% at the start of battle.

effects.description: バトル開始時、アイテムゲージ回復

name: Cherished Aspirations
description: Resna and Valeria met each other as if guided by the stars. Though their interests were far apart at first, they quickly became irreplaceable to each other. No matter what challenges await them, they'll surely overcome them together.

ability.name: Damage Up III
ability.description: Boosts skill damage by {0}%.

effects.description: スキルダメージアップ
